annotations.description: In this episode of How to Drink, I’m making a Sidecar, a drink that was born during the prohibition but still enjoyed to this day. I find these to be very ea...
annotations.title: Sidecar | How to Drink

textContent:
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Lemon Juice
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Dry Curacao
2 oz. -or- 60 ml. Cognac

Shake
Serve in Sugar Rimmed Coupe

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Zik8fgGUOg&list=TLPQMDYxMjIwMTk6uVSijrAplQ&index=3

---

1.5oz Cognac
.75oz  Orange Curcao
.75oz Lemon juice

Wet shake
Rim glass with sugar
Garnish with lemon peel

title: Sidecar
